author: ForrestKnight
description:
Shop Micro Center’s Monthly Sales: https://micro.center/2e4ec6

I've coded on Windows, WSL2, macOS, Linux of various flavors like Ubuntu, Arch Linux, and more operating systems over the past decade, so with all of the hype and talk surrounding all of these operating systems, I wanted to share my general thoughts based on my experience with them. And that's all this video is - it's not what you should do, or what operating system is best, but just my thoughts and what I've learned.

Check out Micro Center’s Newest Store: https://micro.center/4a9879
Read up Micro Center News: https://micro.center/f033f1

Don't know why you'd want to follow me on other socials. I don't even post. But here you go.

title: I Tried Coding on Every OS // My Thoughts
